Export.Routine: WWWDRAGDROP12(YINHALT,YVAR) ;WWWDRAGDROP12;BEC;DRAG AND DROP VON SPEICHERN SIMULATION;23.09.2003 ; ;/------------------------------------------------------------------\ ;| Description of Function : ;| DRAG AND DROP VON SPEICHERN SIMULATION ;| ;| Inputs : ;| ;| ;| ByRef : ;| ;| ;| Returns : ;| ;| ;| History : ;| ;| BEC 23.09.2003 ;| ;\------------------------------------------------------------------/ ; NEW CHART,TEXT,RETVAL,SORT,SORT2,KEY,KEY2 ;SPEICHERN SIMULATION ;Save simulation SET RETVAL="" SET YINHALT=$GET(YINHALT) ;BESCHREIBUNG DER SIMULATION ;description the simulation SET YVAR=$GET(YVAR) ;CHARTNAME QUIT:YINHALT="" SET VERSION=$$^WWWNEXT("WWWDRAGDROP") IF YVAR'="" IF $GET(YBED)'="" DO . MERGE ^WWWDRAGDROPSIM(0,YVAR,+$HOROLOG,YBED,VERSION)=^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V") . SET ^WWWDRAGDROPSIM(0,YVAR,+$HOROLOG,YBED,VERSION)=$PIECE(YINHALT,Y,1) . SET SORT="" FOR SET SORT=$ORDER(^WWWDRAGDROPSIM(0,YVAR,+$HOROLOG,YBED,VERSION,"DATENs",SORT)) QUIT:SORT="" DO . . SET SORT2="" FOR SET SORT2=$ORDER(^WWWDRAGDROPSIM(0,YVAR,+$HOROLOG,YBED,VERSION,"DATENs",SORT,SORT2)) QUIT:SORT2="" DO . . . SET KEY="" FOR SET KEY=$ORDER(^WWWDRAGDROPSIM(0,YVAR,+$HOROLOG,YBED,VERSION,"DATENs",SORT,SORT2,KEY)) QUIT:KEY="" DO . . . . SET ^WWWDRAGDROPSIM(0,YVAR,+$HOROLOG,YBED,VERSION,"DATENs",SORT,SORT2,KEY,1)=$GET(^WWWDRAGDROPSIM(0,YVAR,+$HOROLOG,YBED,VERSION,"DATEN",KEY,1)) . . . . SET KEY2="" FOR SET KEY2=$ORDER(^WWWDRAGDROPSIM(0,YVAR,+$HOROLOG,YBED,VERSION,"DATENn",KEY,KEY2)) QUIT:KEY2="" DO . . . . . SET ^WWWDRAGDROPSIM(0,YVAR,+$HOROLOG,YBED,VERSION,"DATENn",KEY,KEY2,1)=$GET(^WWWDRAGDROPSIM(0,YVAR,+$HOROLOG,YBED,VERSION,"DATEN",KEY_"%s%"_KEY2,1)) . . . . . QUIT . . . . QUIT . . . QUIT . . QUIT . KILL ^WWWDRAGDROPSIM(0,YVAR,+$HOROLOG,YBED,VERSION,"DATEN") . QUIT QUIT RETVAL
